title: RootCauseAnalysis
description: A lightweight schema for quick, practical RCAs. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

title.description: Short title for the incident/RCA. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

created_at.description: Document creation time. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

owner.description: Primary person responsible for this RCA (name or email). Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

summary.description: Clear, concise description of the observed issue. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

start_time.description: When impact started (best known). Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

end_time.description: When impact ended (if applicable). Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

severity.description: Impact severity. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

impact.description: Brief narrative of user/business impact. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

timeline.description: Key events in chronological order. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

type.description: Optional event category. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

link.description: Optional URL to logs, dashboards, PRs, etc. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

evidence.description: Optional supporting artifacts (links or short notes). Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

statement.description: Single sentence explaining the underlying cause. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

contributing_factors.description: Optional list of contributing conditions. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

corrective.description: Steps to fix or contain the issue. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

owner.description: Person or team. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

preventive.description: Optional steps to prevent recurrence. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

verification.description: How you verified the fix/prevention worked (or plan to verify). Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.

lessons_learned.description: Optional key takeaways. Do not include information that is not present in the source. Avoid speculation and hallucination.
